text: Basi jwaakusaka Allah kuti an'jongole, akasansapangulilaga chidali chakwe ku Usilamu, sano jwaakusaka kunnechelela kusokonechela, akasachitenda chidali chakwe kuwa chakangani chaning'aning'a, gambakuwa mpela akulikanganichisya kwela kwinani. Iyyoyopeyo ni yaakutiji Allah pakuwika ilagasyo yakunyalaya kwa awala wangakukulupilila
